collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (25 total Queries, 25 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT * FROM `tbl_position` WHERE `posID` = '1'

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>1</b>', '<b>Accounting Policy</b>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '1.1', '<p>Has an accounting policy been noted for each class of biological asset and its related agricultural produce?</p>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>2</b>', '<b>Performance</b>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p>\r\n<p>41.40</p>', '2.1', '<p>Has the aggregate gain or loss arising during the current period on initial recognition of biological assets and agricultural produce and from change in fair value less costs to sell of biological assets been disclosed?</p>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>3</b>', '<b>General</b>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p>\r\n<p>41.41</p>', '3.1', '<p>Has a description been given of each group of biological assets?</p>\r\n<p>NB: Additional guidance is given in paragraphs 42 to 45 of IAS 41 as to what this might consist of.</p>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p> <p>41.46</p>', '3.2', '<p>Have the following been disclosed:-</p> <ul> <li>The nature of the activities, involving each group of biological assets; and </li> <li>Output of agricultural produce during the period?</li> </ul> <p>NB: If this disclosure has been given in another part of the Annual Report, such as the Directors’ Report, then it does not need to be duplicated.</p>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>4</b>', '<b>Securitisation, Commitments and Risk</b>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p>\r\n<p>41.49(a)</p>', '4.1', '<p>Has the existence and carrying amount of biological assets whose title is restricted been disclosed?</p>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p>\r\n<p>41.49(a)</p>', '4.2', '<p>Have the carrying amounts of biological assets pledged as security for liabilities been disclosed?</p>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p>\r\n<p>41.49(b)</p>', '4.3', '<p>Has the amount of any commitments for the development or acquisition of biological assets been disclosed?</p>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p>\r\n<p>41.49(c)</p>', '4.4', '<p>Have the financial risk management strategies related to agricultural activities been disclosed?</p>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>5</b>', '<b>Reconciliation</b>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p> <p>41.50</p>', '5.1', '<p>Has a reconciliation of each class of biological asset been disclosed, including:</p> <ul> <li>brought forward carrying amount;</li> <li>the gain or loss arising from changes in fair value less costs to sell;</li> <li>increases resulting from purchases;</li> <li>decreases resulting from sales and biological assets classified as held for sale (or included in a disposal group that is classified as held for sale) in accordance with IFRS 5;</li> <li>decreases resulting from harvesting;</li> <li>increases resulting from business combinations;</li> <li>net exchange differences arising on the translation of financial statements into a different presentation currency, and on the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity;</li> <li>other changes; and</li> <li>carried forward carrying amount?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p> <p>41.51</p>', '5.2', '<p>The following disclosure is <b>encouraged</b> (particularly where the production cycle is in excess of one year):</p> <p>A change in fair value might be due to physical changes and also changes in price. By group or otherwise, is the amount of change in fair value less costs to sell included in the profit or loss split between the amount due to physical changes and the amount due to price changes?</p> ', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p>\r\n<p>41.53</p>', '5.3', '<p>Where an event such as virulent disease, a flood, a severe drought or frost or a plague of insects give rise to a material expense, has the nature and amount of this expense been disclosed in accordance with IAS 1?</p>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>6</b>', '<b>Biological Assets Held at Cost Less Accumulated Depreciation / Impairment</b>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p> <p>41.54</p>', '6.1', '<p>Have the following disclosures been given:</p> <ul> <li>A description of the biological assets;</li> <li>An explanation as to why fair value cannot be measured reliably;</li> <li>(If possible) the range of estimates within which fair value is highly likely to lie;</li> <li>The depreciation method used;</li> <li>The useful lives or the depreciation rates used; and</li> <li>The gross carrying amount and the accumulated depreciation (aggregated with accumulated impairment losses) at the beginning and the end of the reporting period?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p> <p>41.55</p>', '6.2', '<p>In the reconciliation required by 5.1 above, have the following been disclosed:</p> <ul> <li>Impairment losses;</li> <li>Reversal of impairment losses; and</li> <li>Depreciation?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p>\r\n<p>41.55</p>', '6.3', '<p>In the reconciliation required by 5.1 above, has the gain or loss on disposal been split between biological assets carried at fair value and those carried at cost?</p>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p> <p>41.56</p>', '6.4', '<p>If the fair value of biological assets previously measured at their cost less any accumulated depreciation and any accumulated impairment losses becomes reliably measurable during the current period, has the following been disclosed:-</p> <ul> <li>A description of the biological asset;</li> <li>An explanation of why fair value has become reliably measurable; and </li> <li>The effect of the change?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>7</b>', '<b>Government Grants</b>\r\n<p>NB: Government Grants which relate to biological assets held at fair value are scoped out of IAS 20, and into IAS 41.</p>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>IAS</p> <p>41.57</p>', '7.1', '<p>Regarding government grants which are within the scope of IAS 41 have the following been disclosed:</p> <ul> <li>The nature and extent of government grants recognised in the financial statements;</li> <li>Unfulfilled conditions and other contingencies attaching to government grants; and</li> <li>Significant decreases expected in the level of government grants?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'ab4d', '3.15.4 Ab4d', '63', 'Active', '2024-04-17 20:18:50')

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <b>Accounting Policy</b>
    [1] => <p>Has an accounting policy been noted for each class of biological asset and its related agricultural produce?</p>
    [2] => <b>Performance</b>
    [3] => <p>Has the aggregate gain or loss arising during the current period on initial recognition of biological assets and agricultural produce and from change in fair value less costs to sell of biological assets been disclosed?</p>
    [4] => <b>General</b>
    [5] => <p>Has a description been given of each group of biological assets?</p>
<p>NB: Additional guidance is given in paragraphs 42 to 45 of IAS 41 as to what this might consist of.</p>
    [6] => <p>Have the following been disclosed:-</p>
<ul>
    <li>The nature of the activities, involving each group of biological assets; and </li>
    <li>Output of agricultural produce during the period?</li>
</ul>
<p>NB: If this disclosure has been given in another part of the Annual Report, such as the Directors’ Report, then it does not need to be duplicated.</p>
    [7] => <b>Securitisation, Commitments and Risk</b>
    [8] => <p>Has the existence and carrying amount of biological assets whose title is restricted been disclosed?</p>
    [9] => <p>Have the carrying amounts of biological assets pledged as security for liabilities been disclosed?</p>
    [10] => <p>Has the amount of any commitments for the development or acquisition of biological assets been disclosed?</p>
    [11] => <p>Have the financial risk management strategies related to agricultural activities been disclosed?</p>
    [12] => <b>Reconciliation</b>
    [13] => <p>Has a reconciliation of each class of biological asset been disclosed, including:</p>
<ul>
    <li>brought forward carrying amount;</li>
    <li>the gain or loss arising from changes in fair value less costs to sell;</li>
    <li>increases resulting from purchases;</li>
    <li>decreases resulting from sales and biological assets classified as held for sale (or included in a disposal group that is classified as held for sale) in accordance with IFRS 5;</li>
    <li>decreases resulting from harvesting;</li>
    <li>increases resulting from business combinations;</li>
    <li>net exchange differences arising on the translation of financial statements into a different presentation currency, and on the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity;</li>
    <li>other changes; and</li>
    <li>carried forward carrying amount?</li>
</ul>
    [14] => <p>The following disclosure is <b>encouraged</b> (particularly where the production cycle is in excess of one year):</p>
<p>A change in fair value might be due to physical changes and also changes in price.  By group or otherwise, is the amount of change in fair value less costs to sell included in the profit or loss split between the amount due to physical changes and the amount due to price changes?</p>

    [15] => <p>Where an event such as virulent disease, a flood, a severe drought or frost or a plague of insects give rise to a material expense, has the nature and amount of this expense been disclosed in accordance with IAS 1?</p>
    [16] => <b>Biological Assets Held at Cost Less Accumulated Depreciation / Impairment</b>
    [17] => <p>Have the following disclosures been given:</p>
<ul>
    <li>A description of the biological assets;</li>
    <li>An explanation as to why fair value cannot be measured reliably;</li>
    <li>(If possible) the range of estimates within which fair value is highly likely to lie;</li>
    <li>The depreciation method used;</li>
    <li>The useful lives or the depreciation rates used; and</li>
    <li>The gross carrying amount and the accumulated depreciation (aggregated with accumulated impairment losses) at the beginning and the end of the reporting period?</li>
</ul>
    [18] => <p>In the reconciliation required by 5.1 above, have the following been disclosed:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Impairment losses;</li>
    <li>Reversal of impairment losses; and</li>
    <li>Depreciation?</li>
</ul>
    [19] => <p>In the reconciliation required by 5.1 above, has the gain or loss on disposal been split between biological assets carried at fair value and those carried at cost?</p>
    [20] => <p>If the fair value of biological assets previously measured at their cost less any accumulated depreciation and any accumulated impairment losses becomes reliably measurable during the current period, has the following been disclosed:-</p>
<ul>
    <li>A description of the biological asset;</li>
    <li>An explanation of why fair value has become reliably measurable; and </li>
    <li>The effect of the change?</li>
</ul>
    [21] => <b>Government Grants</b>
<p>NB: Government Grants which relate to biological assets held at fair value are scoped out of IAS 20, and into IAS 41.</p>
    [22] => <p>Regarding government grants which are within the scope of IAS 41 have the following been disclosed:</p>
<ul>
    <li>The nature and extent of government grants recognised in the financial statements;</li>
    <li>Unfulfilled conditions and other contingencies attaching to government grants; and</li>
    <li>Significant decreases expected in the level of government grants?</li>
</ul>
)
